page.title: 14Health in Priors Marston
page.content: {Paramedical Services. The Chiropody Service in South Warwickshire holds a monthly clinic in the village, in its mobile van. Physio-, occupational & speech therapy are available on a domiciliary basis, but except in special circumstances patients are required to attand hospital. { {Associated Social Services. { }A Home Help service, run by Warwickshire County Council, is organised from Southam. { { {Voluntary Associations. Meals on Wheels from Napton WRVS. Social Car Service, organised by village volunteers & partly financed by Social Services dept of WCC, provides transport to Byfield Medical Centre or hospital.
